title: Apartment for sale in Talawathugoda
details:
Apartment for sale in Thalawathugoda - Prime Residencies Fiero,

Brand New Apartment
3 Beds (1 A/C room)

servent wahroom

24 hour security with a swimming pool, fully equipped modern gymnasium, parking facilities and a 30ft wide road. This complex is only 3 minutes from Thalawathugoda Junction.
